name: AME - tiny adventures of a tiny cat
name_original: AME - tiny adventures of a tiny cat
description:
Ame is a little cat who loves to live tiny adventures in his head. Do you want to spend a few minutes with him?

Just something cute, casual, simple and relaxing. I purposely didn't add music.

Hope you'll like it. Maybe I will improve it and add more.

Made with Flicksy 2, hacked to support 64x64 resolution.
All art by me.
